entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 09:54 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
